website_summaries.verdict: Cute M&M character-themed dispenser for M&Ms or other small candies.
pros: M&Ms come out the bottom of the plane in a tray that keeps them handy
Good gift for pilots or any M&M lover
Works with other small candies like jelly beans
cons: Peanut M&Ms can get stuck inside this dispenser

customer_reviews.title: Great toy - disappointed with the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I got this to gift to a friend. But there were a couple of scratches in the part where the chocolate is dispensed. Also, there was a price-tag at the bottom which was a pain to remove (And this being a gift, I'd definitely want to get rid of it without leaving a mark) The person loved the toy, but I think the packaging could be improved upon. Giving it 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Manny K

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Bigger than it looks. My nephew loved it.
customer_reviews.author: OZ

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my pilot. Works great and quite the conversation starter. Delivers a generous portion with a simple turn of the propeller.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and clever on how to get candy from toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I purchased this for a Christmas gift. I know it will be a big hit with the person that is getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Propeller turns
customer_reviews.text: Cute as it can be, but this is really NOT a toy. It gives JOY and M&M's, but young kids need supervision.
customer_reviews.author: buglegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great M&M airplane
customer_reviews.text: The m&m airplane was very cute. My husband loved it, it is sitting on his office desk. Its the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna A. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and I may keep it myself instead of the intended gift it is supposed to be. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Veenindra J. Singh

customer_reviews.title: It dispenses too many regular M & M's so I ...
customer_reviews.text: It dispenses too many regular M & M's so I tried the peanut M&M's, but they sometimes get stuck. I wonder if the "Mega" M & M's would be the solution?
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. I feel this is a collectors item and should not be used as a toy. Our grandson feels it it is a special treat to turn the propellor and receive his M &M's.
customer_reviews.author: Kathye Caserta

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, unique, and so much fun! It was actually for an adult who loved it! I may order a different type for another dear friend of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Rudzik

customer_reviews.title: MM Airplain
customer_reviews.text: We love the mm dispenser and plain to get more for the rest of the family. The grand kids come over and love it not only for the candy but how much fun it is to make it put some candy out,and it looks cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: M & M Toy Airplane
customer_reviews.text: I collect M & M dispensers. This one is adorable. Love it. Great condition. Will buy more pieces in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Appeared to be as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift. Cute item. Not sure about durability or ease of use since I gave it to someone. Note that the M&Ms simply fall into the dish at the side, so if you are looking for a dispenser, this is not one.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Willis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my pilot hubby who also loves M&M's!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for Peanut M&Ms
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome dispenser. I would not use it for peanut M&Ms.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Even 80 year olds love it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband's dad for Christmas since he flew in WWII and he had a great time with it. Nicely made and came in a nice box, too. Was a bit disappointed in that we still had to go out and buy a bag of MM's because it did not come with a bag included.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mouse

customer_reviews.title: I get a lot of comments on how cool this is and when they find out it dispenses ...
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of comments on how cool this is and when they find out it dispenses M&M's they love. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: gthorpe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product! Works great on my desk at the office! Only problem is that I can't keep it filled up! Ha! This is a must for every collector and aviation enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the M & M Barnstormer for awhile and they must becoming rare. I was surprised to find one right before Christmas and at an affordable price. It arrived just in time and was just as described. It was a gift and the recipient was surprised and very pleased. He has several M & M dispensers and this one is now his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sue

customer_reviews.title: Geat product, well packaged for shipment
customer_reviews.text: Unique toy and substantial packaging made this a good buy. Toy was as advertised. I would buy from this vendor again!
customer_reviews.author: JRLV

customer_reviews.title: M&M
customer_reviews.text: The M&M plane arrived on time and in great condition. It was bought as a present and they absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: kim dean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks so cute & the perfect gift for any one who collects M&M.
customer_reviews.author: Patience Narez

product_meta.title: M&M Toy Airplane Candy Dispenser AKA Barnstorming Airplane rides with character Red as pilot & character Yellow as passenger
product_meta.description: Act fast to scoop up The Collector's Edition M&M'S Barnstorming Rides(tm) Dispenser. Be sure to purchase yours today. Dispenser is 9.5" wide, 8" tall, and weighs almost 2 lbs. Dispenser does not come in collector's box.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
